    Great Bear Tattoo

    Established in May 2016, Great Bear Tattoo quickly built a loyal following on Facebook with consistently high quality work and a focus on approachability. In 2017 we were approached to help elevate the brand to the next level with professional photography and a short promotional video.

    Services Provided

    Promotional Video • Photography

    Visit Site

    Effective Social Content

    A single 2 hour photography and video shoot was all that was required to generate a powerful video and months worth of drip-fed social content. The photos were slowly released with added graphics to create a strong brand presence on Facebook. Along with Great Bear Tattoo’s excellent reviews and regular work updates, they’ve generated an exceptionally high demand with a 14 month waiting list that just keeps growing.

    4, 500+
    Organic Views

    Professional Photos
